name: Additional Team Member
effect:
Counter

name: Agira
effect:
Male
[FOR THE REVENGE]
When this Ninja is sent out to Battle, you can remove 3 Ninja cards, with a "Taijutsu" Combat Attribute, in your Discard Pile, from game. In that case, give 1 Damage to 1 Ninja.

name: Anger of the Tailed Beast
effect: Effect: Randomly select up to 2 cards from your opponent's hand and move them(it) to their Chakra area. Then, select the same amount of cards from their Chakra area and move them(it) to your opponent's hand.

name: Anko Mitarashi
effect:
Leaf | Special Jonin | Female | Mental Power: 1 | Proctor
[PANGS]

effect:
Permanent (2)

name: Argument
effect:
Counter
Target: 1 Mission card being played

name: Art of the Raging Lion's Mane
effect:
Target: User

name: Asuma Sarutobi

Leaf | Jonin | Male | 12 Shinobi Guardians

name: Attack from Behind
effect:
Target: Every Ninja Battling against the user

"The speed of his jutsu is incredible; I didn't even see a hand sign. The shuriken in his hand were just a ruse to distract me from his Water Style attack."

name: Attacking on Both Sides
effect: Effect: Place 1 Growth coin on every other Ninja in the user's Team.

name: Backup
effect:
Permanent (2)

name: Black Sword

name: Combination Jutsu

Target: 1 Ninja Battling against the user

Valid: When a Jutsu card is used that targets this Ninja, you can discard 2 of your Chakras with a "Wind" Symbol. In that case, negate that Jutsu and move it to the owner's hand.
"This is the Big One… where I bet it all… where I put my life on the line."

name: Under The Drifting Clouds
effect: Effect: Move all the cards in your hand to the bottom of your Deck in any order. Then, draw the same number of cards plus one.
"Where's Shikamaru?"

name: Violent Emotion
effect: Effect: Look at the top X number of cards of your Deck, reveal 1 Jutsu or Mission card from among them and place it in your hand. Then, move the rest to the top of your Deck in any order. X = the number of your in-play "Female" only Ninjas.
"I'll pound you if you say anything else."

name: War Cry
effect: Effect: Move up to X number of cards from your Discard Pile to your Chakra area. X = The number of your opponent's Battle Rewards.
"What is it now?"

name: Water Clone Jutsu
effect: Effect: Put a Ninja Blade coin in play in the user's Team in any position. While that coin is in play, it is considered to be a Ninja that is a copy of the user but with no effect text. At the end of the turn, if it still remains in play, discard it.
"Your words cut deep, deeper than any blade."

name: Water Style: Syrup Trap
effect:
Target: 1 Back Ninja Battling against the user
Effect: The target's Power becomes 0/0 during this turn.
"Too slow."

name: Water Style: Water Shark Bomb Jutsu
effect:
Target: 1 Ninja Battling against the user
Effect: Injure the target.
"He broke out the same Jutsu that I did!"

name: Wind Style: Rasen Shuriken
effect:
Requirements: "Naruto Uzumaki" + "Printed Entrance cost of 3 or more"
Target: 1 Ninja Battling against the user
Effect: Remove the target from game. In that case, search your opponent's hand, Deck, Chakra area, and Discard Pile for Ninja cards with the same printed Name and remove them from the game. Then, injure the user.
"This is the end!"
